headline: I right click the image, confused there's no blurred text, then realize it's css crime, sorry for "hacking" by pressing F12

markdown.content: F12 reference: https://redd.it/q8dtl9 (RIP Reddit, API price increase just go to show IPO greed) or https://techcrunch.com/2021/10/15/f12-isnt-hacking-missouri-governor-threatens-to-prosecute-local-journalist-for-finding-exposed-state-data/

hey. HEY. stop it. right now. you're not supposed to see this text. in fact, the text shouldn't even be selectable due to the other div. so... you really went ahead and opened up developer tools for this one. wow. you really care about me that much? really. what a weirdo...

anyway, while you're here (and since you seem to be so deeply interested in my posts), why don't I share a bit of info on my next game? not the one I've been teasing for months, obviously... but another project I've picked up since hearing about the upcoming DOS jam! it's going to be a small word game for DOS that shouldn't take me too long to finish. hopefully I can manage both that and the other project at the same time...

anyway...! thanks for reading this filler text! nerd.
